name: San Francisco Department of Disability and Aging Services
description: The San Francisco Department of Disability and Aging Services (DAS) coordinates services for older adults, veterans, people with disabilities, and their families to maximize safety, health, and independence. They partner with several community-based organizations to offer their free services. The DAS Benefits and Resources Hub is closed to the public for in-person services, but they remain open for remote services by phone. Visit DAS webpage for contact numbers.
